titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2825 Oak Lawn Avenue in Dallas, Texas, as the "William H. 'Bill' Nelson Post Office Building".
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2825 Oak Lawn Avenue in Dallas, Texas, as the "William H. 'Bill' Nelson Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2825 Oak Lawn Avenue in Dallas, Texas, as the "William H. 'Bill' Nelson Post Office Building."
